inclusion.criterion: histologically proven glioblastoma, gliosarcoma or anaplastic glioma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine.

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status (KPS) equal or greater than 60
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: prior treatment with bevacizumab or Vorinostat
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: No mention of prior treatment with bevacizumab or Vorinostat.

exclusion.criterion: history of any other cancer (except non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in-situ of the cervix or bladder)
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, but it is unclear if this meets the exclusion criteria.

exclusion.criterion: inadequately controlled hypertension (defined as systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg)
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about patient's blood pressure.

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, but it is unclear if this meets the exclusion criteria for other cancers. Additionally, there is no information provided about KPS or blood pressure.
